game.name: Rat Crossing
game.description:
Be a real player and try out at least once this brand new adventure game named Rat Crossing! This awesome skill game is definitely a treat to all those who love animals. Here you will get a chance to meet a little cute rate who wants to cross the roads with the continuous traffic. Do you think that you are the right candidate for this job? Join Rat Crossing and get ready to help the rat cross the road. Make sure to collect the cheese on the other side. 

Although it sounds a little bit tricky, looking at the instructions and playing it several times in your device will make it easier to achieve the goal of the game. Try to keep rate away from being hit by any of the cars running at different speeds on the road! You have the skill to get him to reach at the destination in the end. It requires to score 100 to determine the reason why does rat want to cross the road. 

In this free online escaping game for boys, you can use arrow keys or tap controls to move your character. Play this cute HTML5 game with or without music in your device! The greenery environment, running cars at high speed and a huge traffic available on the road makes this game like the real one. Once you get into this graphically-improved game, you will not leave it until you clear all its levels. Play many more adventure games for boys on our website for free!
